description: The sip MCP (Model Context Protocol) integration provides a powerful way to automate and manage Solana token swaps directly through an intelligent agent or system. It essentially turns complex blockchain interactions into easily callable "tools" within your MCP server.

privateKey.description: Solana private key for transaction signing (loaded from environment).

capabilities.name: executeSolanaSwap
capabilities.description: Execute a token swap on the Solana, buying one token with another, or selling a token for USDC.

capabilities.name: searchTokens
capabilities.description: Searches for cryptocurrency tokens by keyword and optional blockchain chain. Defaults to Solana if no chain is specified. Return the mint addresses
